Class_Skill_Desc_Aetherial Manipulation: Rush to a target's side.</br>Unable to cast if bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ascend: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Aspected Benefic: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Aspected Helios: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 150</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Astral Draw: Draws the Balance, the Arrow, the Spire, and the Lord of Crowns from your divining deck.</br>Additional Effect: Restores 20% of maximum MP</br>Upon execution, Play I changes to The Balance, Play II changes to The Arrow, Play III changes to The Spire, Minor Arcana changes to Lord of Crowns, and Astral Draw changes to Umbral Draw.</br>Shares a recast timer with Umbral Draw.
Class_Skill_Desc_Backstep L: Jump 10 yalms back from current position. Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banish L: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 200.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts undead targets with Banish L, increasing damage taken by 25%</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Banish L III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts undead targets with Banish L, increasing damage taken by 25%</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Firm Resolve: Storm the field under the Banner of Firm Resolve, gaining additional stacks each time damage is taken, up to a maximum of 5.</br>Banner of Firm Resolve Effect: Reduces damage dealt by 15% per stack</br>Duration: 30s</br>At maximum stacks, take up the Banner of Unyielding Defense.</br>Banner of Unyielding Defense Effect: Reduces damage taken by 30%</br>Duration: 180s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Honed Acuity: Storm the field under the Banner of Honed Acuity, gaining additional stacks each time an attack is evaded, up to a maximum of 3.</br>Banner of Honed Acuity Effect: Increases damage taken by 10% per stack</br>Duration: 120s</br>At maximum stacks, take up the Banner of Transcendent Finesse.</br>Banner of Transcendent Finesse Effect: Increases critical hit rate by 30% and reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 20%</br>Duration: 180s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Honored Sacri: Storm the field under the Banner of Honored Sacrifice, increasing damage dealt by 55% while draining your HP.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Noble Ends: Storm the field under the Banner of Noble Ends, increasing damage dealt by 50% while reducing own HP recovery via most healing actions by 100%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Solemn Clarit: Storm the field under the Banner of Solemn Clarity, periodically gaining additional stacks, up to a maximum of 4.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.</br>At maximum stacks, take up the Banner of Limitless Grace.</br>Banner of Limitless Grace Effect: Increases healing potency by 50% while reducing MP cost</br>Duration: 120s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Benefic: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 500</br>Additional Effect: 15% chance next Benefic II will restore critical HP</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodbath L: Converts a portion of damage dealt into HP.</br>Duration: 45s
Class_Skill_Desc_Breath of the Earth: Restores 60% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Celestial Intersection: Restores own or target party member's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Additional Sect Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling 200% of the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Celestial Opposition: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Collective Unconscious: Creates a celestial ring 8 yalms around the caster.</br>Duration: 18s</br>Additional Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10% for self and any party members within 30 yalms and applies Wheel of Fortune to self and any party members within 8 yalms</br>Duration: 5s</br>Wheel of Fortune Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effects will be applied continuously to self and all party members standing within the celestial ring.</br>Collective Unconscious effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Death L: KOs target. The less the target's HP, the greater the chance of success.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Aet: Increases damage dealt by 96%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Bre: Increases poison resistance and movement speed, including mount speed, and increases evasion by 20%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Ord: Increases damage dealt by 24%, healing potency by 30%, and maximum MP by 60%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Pro: Reduces healing potency by 70% while increasing damage dealt by 120%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Tem: Increases defense by 60%, maximum HP by 54%, and damage dealt by 72%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Vet: Increases physical defense by 180%, magic defense by 54%, and maximum HP by 72%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Dispel L: Removes one beneficial status from target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Divination: Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members by 6%.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Divining</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Earthly Star: Deploys an Earthly Star in the designated area and grants the effect of Earthly Dominance.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Executing Stellar Detonation while under the effect of Earthly Dominance creates a Stellar Burst dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 205 to all nearby enemies. Also restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 540</br>After 10s, Earthly Dominance effect is changed to Giant Dominance.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Waiting 10s or executing Stellar Detonation while under the effect of Giant Dominance creates a Stellar Explosion dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 310 to all nearby enemies. Also restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 720
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Aetherwe: Increases damage dealt by 80%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Breathta: Increases poison resistance and movement speed, including mount speed, and increases evasion by 10%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Ordained: Increases damage dealt by 20%, healing potency by 25%, and maximum MP by 50%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Profane: Reduces healing potency by 70% while increasing damage dealt by 100%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Templar: Increases defense by 50%, maximum HP by 45%, and damage dealt by 60%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Veteran: Increases physical defense by 150%, magic defense by 45%, and maximum HP by 60%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essential Dignity: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Potency increases up to 900 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 30% HP or less.</br>Maximum Charges: 3
Class_Skill_Desc_Esuna: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Exaltation: Reduces damage taken by self or target party member by 10%.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP at the end of the effect's duration</br>Cure Potency: 500
Class_Skill_Desc_Fall Malefic: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 270.
Class_Skill_Desc_Feint L: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces target's evasion</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Focus L: Grants a stack of Boost, up to a maximum of 16.</br>Boost Bonus: Increases potency of next weaponskill by 30% per stack</br>Duration: 30s</br>Shares a recast timer with all other weaponskills and spells.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gravity: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gravity II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Class_Skill_Desc_Healing Wind: Restores 25% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Helios: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 400
Class_Skill_Desc_Helios Conjunction: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 175</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Horoscope: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Potency is determined by the Horoscope effect of party members. Effect expires upon execution.</br>Horoscope Potency: 200</br>Horoscope Helios Potency: 400
Class_Skill_Desc_Incense L: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list and increasing enmity generation.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lady of Crowns: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Minor Arcana changes to Lady of Crowns when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Light Curtain: Grants the effect of Lost Reflect to self.</br>Lost Reflect Effect: Reflects most magic attacks</br>Duration: 10s</br>Shares a recast timer with all other weaponskills and spells.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lightspeed: Reduces cast times for spells by 2.5 seconds.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Lodestone: Instantly return to the starting point of the area.</br>Cannot be executed while in combat.</br>Shares a recast timer with all other weaponskills and spells.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lord of Crowns: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 400 to all nearby enemies.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Minor Arcana changes to Lord of Crowns when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Arise: Restores all of a KO'd target's HP.</br>If the target was weakened at the time of Raise, the weakness effect will be removed.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Banish III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 200 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage undead enemies take by 25%</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Bravery: Increases damage dealt by an ally or self by 5%.</br>Duration: 600s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Bubble: Increases maximum HP of self or target player by 30%.</br>Duration: 600s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Burst: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 300 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Interrupts all nearby enemies</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage taken by enemies with Magical Aversion by 10%</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Chainspell: Temporarily eliminates cast time for all spells.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Magic Burst</br>Magic Burst Effect: Increases spell damage by 45% while increasing MP cost</br>Duration: 30s</br>Spirit of the Ordained Effect: Raises Magic Burst spell damage increase to 100% and nullifies additional MP cost</br>Spirit of the Watcher Effect: Lost Chainspell duration is extended to 90s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Death: KOs target. The less the target's HP, the greater the chance of success.</br>Spirit of the Ordained Effect: Chance of success is increased</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Furthermore, the recast timer cannot be affected by other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Dispel: Removes one beneficial status from target.</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Fair Trade: Through sheer force of will, restore a random technique of the lost to physical form and throw it at a single target, dealing damage with a potency of 50.</br>Potency increases up to 1,000 based on the weight of the lost action.</br>The lost action thrown will be lost upon execution.</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Furthermore, the recast timer cannot be affected by other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Focus: Grants a stack of Boost, up to a maximum of 16.</br>Boost Bonus: Increases potency of next weaponskill by 15% per stack</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect ends upon using another lost action.</br>Shares a recast timer with all other weaponskills and spells.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Font of Magic: Increases damage dealt by 70%, draining MP while in use.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Spirit of the Veteran Effect: Grants Spell Shield to self</br>Spell Shield Effect: Reduces magic damage taken by 50%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Font of Skill: Resets the recast timer for most actions and role actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Full Cure: Fully restores HP and MP while granting Auto-potion and Auto-ether to self and nearby party members.</br>Auto-potion Effect: Restores HP automatically when HP falls below 50%</br>Duration: 600s</br>When triggered, there is a 50% chance the effect will end.</br>Auto-ether Effect: Restores MP automatically when MP falls below 20%</br>Duration: 600s</br>When triggered, there is a 50% chance the effect will end.</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Chance for Auto-potion and Auto-ether effect to end is reduced to 10%
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Impetus: Quickly dash 10 yalms forward.</br>Additional Effect: Applies Lost Swift to self and nearby party members</br>Lost Swift Effect: Greatly increases movement speed</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other movement speed enhancing abilities.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Increases evasion of self and nearby party members by 15%</br>Duration: 60s</br>Spirit of the Watcher Effect: Grants Rapid Recast to self and nearby party members</br>Rapid Recast Effect: Shortens recast time for next ability used by 25%</br>Effect only applies to certain abilities.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Incense: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list. </br>Additional Effect: Enmity generation is increased and damage taken is reduced by 20%</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Manawall: Temporarily applies Heavy to self, while reducing damage taken by 90% and nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Perception: Detect traps within a radius of 15 yalms.</br>If there are no traps within 15 yalms, alerts you to the presence of traps with a radius of 36 yalms.</br>※This action can only be used in Delubrum Reginae.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Protect: Applies a barrier to self or target player reducing physical damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 30m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Protect II: Applies a barrier to self or target player reducing physical damage taken by 15%.</br>Duration: 30m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Reflect: Creates a barrier around self or party member that reflects most magic attacks.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Spirit of the Guardian Effect: Duration is increased to 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Reraise: Grants the effect of Reraise to self or target player.</br>Reraise Effect: Grants an 80% chance of automatic revival upon KO</br>Duration: 180m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Sacrifice: Restores all of a KO'd target's HP.</br>Cannot be executed if currently afflicted with Sacrifice.</br>Additional Effect: Inflicts Sacrifice on self</br>Sacrifice Effect: When effect expires, you will be KO'd</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Seraph Strike: Consumes MP to deliver a jumping attack that deals unaspected damage with a potency of 500.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces target's accuracy by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Cleric Stance to self.</br>Cleric Stance Bonus: Reduces healing potency by 60% while increasing damage dealt by 60%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Shell: Applies a barrier to self or target player reducing magic damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 30m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Shell II: Applies a barrier to self or target player reducing magic damage taken by 15%.</br>Duration: 30m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Spellforge: Grants the effect of Lost Spellforge to self or target ally.</br>Lost Spellforge Effect: All attacks deal magic damage. However, all bonuses to damage dealt are determined by the attack's base damage type.</br>Duration: 300s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Lost Steelsting.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Stealth: Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for most enemies to detect you, but reducing movement speed by 25%. Has no effect on certain enemies with special sight.</br>Cannot be executed while in combat.</br>Effect ends upon use of any action other than Sprint, or upon reuse.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Steelsting: Grants the effect of Lost Steelsting to self or target ally.</br>Lost Steelsting Effect: All attacks deal physical damage. However, all bonuses to damage dealt are determined by the attack's base damage type.</br>Duration: 300s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Lost Spellforge.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Stoneskin: Applies a barrier to self or target player that absorbs damage totaling 15% of target's maximum HP.</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Stoneskin II: Creates a barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage totaling 10% of maximum HP.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Swift: Greatly increases movement speed.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other movement speed enhancing abilities.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Increases evasion by 30%</br>Duration: 60s</br>Spirit of the Watcher Effect: Grants Rapid Recast to self</br>Rapid Recast Effect: Shortens recast time for next ability used by 60%</br>Effect only applies to certain abilities.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Macrocosmos: Deals unaspected damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 270 for the first enemy, and 40% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Macrocosmos to self and all nearby party members</br>Duration: 15s</br>For the effect's duration, 50% of damage taken is compiled.</br>Restores HP equal to a cure of 200 potency plus compiled damage when the effect expires or upon execution of Microcosmos.</br>Amount restored cannot exceed the target's maximum HP.</br>Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Class_Skill_Desc_Magic Burst L: Increases spell damage by 100% while increasing MP cost.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Malefic: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150.
Class_Skill_Desc_Malefic II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 160.
Class_Skill_Desc_Malefic III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 190.
Class_Skill_Desc_Malefic IV: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 230.
Class_Skill_Desc_Microcosmos: Triggers the healing effect of Macrocosmos, restoring HP equal to a cure of 200 potency plus 50% of compiled damage.</br>Amount restored cannot exceed the target's maximum HP.
Class_Skill_Desc_Mimic: Study the lost techniques used by a targeted ally and make them your own.</br>Cannot be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Minor Arcana: Plays the drawn arcanum after executing Astral Draw or Umbral Draw.</br>Astral Draw Effect: Action changes to Lord of Crowns</br>Umbral Draw Effect: Action changes to Lady of Crowns
Class_Skill_Desc_Neutral Sect: Increases healing magic potency by 20%.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: When casting Aspected Benefic or Helios Conjunction, erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage</br>Aspected Benefic Effect: Nullifies damage equaling 250% of the amount of HP restored</br>Helios Conjunction Effect: Nullifies damage equaling 125% of the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Suntouched</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Oracle: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 860 for the first enemy and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Can only be executed while Divining.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Aspected Benefic: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 6,000</br>Potency increases up to 9,000 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 50% HP or less.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Diurnal Benefic to target</br>Diurnal Benefic Effect: Gradually restores HP</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 6s</br>When cast via Double Cast, grants Nocturnal Benefic.</br>Nocturnal Benefic Effect: Creates a barrier around target that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 4,000 potency</br>Duration: 12s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Celestial River: Increases damage dealt and healing potency of self and nearby party members by 30%, while reducing damage dealt and healing potency of nearby enemies by 30%.</br>Effect is reduced by 10% every 5 seconds.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Divining to self</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 105s</br>※Action changes to Oracle upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Diabrosis: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 9,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces target's HP recovered by healing actions by 33%</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Double Cast: Repeats the Fall Malefic, Aspected Benefic, or Gravity II you previously cast.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed following Fall Malefic, Aspected Benefic, or Gravity II.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Epicycle: Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.</br>Additional Effect: Leaves behind a Pole Star at point of origin, and grants Retrograde Ready to self</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 5s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Action changes to Retrograde upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Fall Malefic: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000.</br>When cast via Double Cast, reduces the recast time of Double Cast by 6 seconds.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Gravity II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 7,500 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts first target with Heavy +75%</br>Duration: 3s</br>When cast via Double Cast, Binds first target.</br>Duration: 3s</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Lady of Crowns: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 6,000</br>Additional Effect: Reduces target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while the Lady of Crowns is drawn.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Lord of Crowns: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while the Lord of Crowns is drawn.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Macrocosmos: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 10,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Macrocosmos to self and all nearby party members</br>Duration: 10s</br>Action changes to Microcosmos upon execution.</br>For the effect's duration, 20% of damage taken is compiled.</br>Restores HP equal to a cure of 4,000 potency plus compiled damage when the effect expires or upon execution of Microcosmos.</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Microcosmos: Triggers the healing effect of Macrocosmos, restoring HP equal to a cure of 4,000 potency plus 20% of compiled damage.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Minor Arcana: Draws either the Lord of Crowns or the Lady of Crowns from your divining deck.</br>Action changes to the drawn arcanum.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Oracle: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s</br>Can only be executed while Divining.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Retrograde: Move instantly to the Pole Star left behind by you.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Retrograde Ready.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Stoneskin II: Creates a barrier around self and all nearby party members that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 12,000 potency.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Paralyze L III: Afflicts target and all neaby enemies with Paralysis.</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Play I: Plays the drawn arcanum after executing Astral Draw or Umbral Draw.</br>Astral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Balance</br>Umbral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Spear
Class_Skill_Desc_Play II: Plays the drawn arcanum after executing Astral Draw or Umbral Draw.</br>Astral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Arrow</br>Umbral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Bole
Class_Skill_Desc_Play III: Plays the drawn arcanum after executing Astral Draw or Umbral Draw.</br>Astral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Spire</br>Umbral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Ewer
Class_Skill_Desc_Pure Essence of the Div: Increases defense by 25%, damage dealt by 35%, and maximum HP by 100%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence, Deep Essence, or Pure Essence actions.</br>It is said that Pure Essences may grant unexpected effects...</br>※This action can only be used in Delubrum Reginae.
Class_Skill_Desc_Reflect L: Creates a magic-reflecting barrier around self or party member.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Refresh L: Increases the amount of magia aether regenerated over time by self and nearby party members.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Rejuvenate L: Instantly restores 50% of maximum HP and MP.
Class_Skill_Desc_Repose: Afflicts target with Sleep.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rescue: Instantly draws target party member to your side. Cannot be used outside of combat or when target is suffering from certain enfeeblements.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Elixir: Restores own HP and MP to maximum.</br>Shares a recast timer with Resistance Potion and Dynamis Dice.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Ether Kit: Grants Auto-ether to self.</br>Auto-ether Effect: Restores MP automatically when MP falls below 20%</br>Duration: 600s</br>When triggered, there is a 50% chance the effect will end.</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Chance for Auto-ether effect to end is reduced to 10%</br>Shares a recast timer with Resistance Potion Kit and Resistance Medikit.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Medikit: Removes a single detrimental effect from self. When not suffering from detrimental effects, creates a barrier that protects against most status ailments. The barrier is removed after curing the next status ailment suffered.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with similar barrier actions.</br>Duration: 30m</br>Shares a recast timer with Resistance Potion Kit and Resistance Ether Kit.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Phoenix: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Potion: Gradually restores HP.</br>Cure Potency: 1,600</br>Duration: 40s</br>Shares a recast timer with Dynamis Dice and Resistance Elixir.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Potion Kit: Grants Auto-potion to self.</br>Auto-potion Effect: Restores HP automatically when HP falls below 50%</br>Duration: 600s</br>When triggered, there is a 50% chance the effect will end.</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Chance for Auto-potion effect to end is reduced to 10%</br>Shares a recast timer with Resistance Ether Kit and Resistance Medikit.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Reraiser: Grants a 70% chance of automatic revival upon KO.</br>Duration: 180m
Class_Skill_Desc_Sacrifice L: Restores all of a KO'd target's HP.</br>Cannot be executed if currently afflicted with Sacrifice.</br>Additional Effect: Inflicts Sacrifice on self</br>Sacrifice Effect: When effect expires, you will be KO'd</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Spirit of the Remembere: Increases maximum HP by 10% and accuracy by 30%.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a 70% chance of automatic revival upon KO</br>Duration: 180m
Class_Skill_Desc_Stealth L: Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for most enemies to detect you, but reducing movement speed by 50%. Has no effect on certain enemies with special sight.</br>Cannot be executed while in combat.</br>Effect ends upon use of any action other than Sprint, or upon reuse.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stellar Detonation: While under the effect of Earthly Dominance, detonates the currently deployed Earthly Star, creating a Stellar Burst that deals unaspected damage with a potency of 205 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members</br>Cure Potency: 540</br>While under the effect of Giant Dominance, detonates the currently deployed Earthly Star, creating a Stellar Explosion that deals unaspected damage with a potency of 310 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members</br>Cure Potency: 720
Class_Skill_Desc_Stoneskin L: Creates a barrier around target that absorbs damage totaling 10% of target's maximum HP.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Sun Sign: Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while Suntouched.
Class_Skill_Desc_Surecast: Spells can be cast without interruption.</br>Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Synastry: Generate an aetheric bond with target party member. Each time you cast a single-target healing spell on yourself or a party member, the party member with whom you have the bond will also recover HP equaling 40% of the original spell.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Umbral Draw: Draws the Spear, the Bole, the Ewer, and the Lady of Crowns from your divining deck.</br>Additional Effect: Restores 20% of maximum MP</br>Upon execution, Play I changes to The Spear, Play II changes to The Bole, Play III changes to The Ewer, Minor Arcana changes to Lady of Crowns, and Umbral Draw changes to Astral Draw.</br>Shares a recast timer with Astral Draw.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Astral Draw changes to Umbral Draw when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Aetherwea: Increases magic damage dealt by 60%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Breathtak: Increases poison resistance and movement speed, including mount speed, and increases evasion by 10%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Ordained: Increases maximum MP by 50% and healing magic potency by 25%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Platebear: Reduces damage taken by 80% while increasing maximum HP by 50%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Templar: Increases healing magic potency by 50% and maximum HP by 30%, while reducing damage dealt by 5%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Arrow: Increases HP recovery via healing actions for a party member or self by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Play II changes to The Arrow when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Balance: Increases damage dealt by a party member or self by 6% if target is melee DPS or tank, or 3% for all other roles.</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Play I changes to The Balance when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Bole: Reduces damage taken by a party member or self by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Play II changes to The Bole when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Ewer: Grants healing over time effect to a party member or self.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Play III changes to The Ewer when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Spear: Increases damage dealt by a party member or self by 6% if target is ranged DPS or healer, or 3% for all other roles.</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Play I changes to The Spear when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Spire: Creates a barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency.</br>Duration: 30s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Play III changes to The Spire when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Status_Desc_Celestial River: Damage dealt and potency of HP restoration actions are increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Combust III: Damage dealt and potency of all HP restoration actions are reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Diabrosis: HP recovery via healing actions is reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Divination: Damage dealt is increased while damage taken is reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Epicycle: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Horoscope: Primed to receive the healing effects of Horoscope.
Class_Status_Desc_Intersection: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Lady of Crowns: The Lady of Crowns card is drawn.
Class_Status_Desc_Lord of Crowns: The Lord of Crowns card is drawn.
Class_Status_Desc_Macrocosmos: Restores HP when effect duration expires or the astrologian who granted this effect executes Microcosmos. Healing potency is based on damage taken and compiled over the duration of the effect.
Class_Status_Desc_Neutral Sect: Spell cast and recast times are reduced.</br>Helios is upgraded to Aspected Helios, while Benefic is upgraded to Aspected Benefic.
Class_Status_Desc_Stoneskin II: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Surecast: Spells cannot be interrupted by taking damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Swiftcast: Next spell will require no time to cast.
Class_Status_Desc_Synastry: An aetheric bond is created with a party astrologian. Each time a single-target healing spell is cast by the astrologian, you will recover partial HP.
Class_Status_Desc_The Arrow: HP recovery via healing actions is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_The Spire: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Trait_Desc_Aspected Helios Mastery: Upgrades Aspected Helios to Helios Conjunction.
Class_Trait_Desc_Combust Mastery II: Upgrades Combust II to Combust III.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Benefic: Grants a 15% chance that your next Benefic II will restore critical HP.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Celestial Inte: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Celestial Intersection.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Essential Dign: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Essential Dignity.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Allows a third charge of Essential Dignity.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Healing Magic: Increases the healing potency of Benefic to 500, Helios to 400, Benefic II to 800, Aspected Benefic to 250, Aspected Benefic's Regen effect to 250, Aspected Helios to 250, and Aspected Helios's Regen effect to 150.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Neutral Sect: Grants Suntouched upon executing Neutral Sect.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Hyper Lightspeed: Reduces Lightspeed recast time to 60 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Magick Mastery: Increases the potency of Combust III's damage over time to 70, Fall Malefic to 270, Gravity II to 140, and Macrocosmos to 270.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend II: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Malefic Mastery II: Upgrades Malefic II to Malefic III.
Class_Trait_Desc_Malefic Mastery III: Upgrades Malefic III to Malefic IV.
Class_Trait_Desc_Malefic Mastery IV: Upgrades Malefic IV to Fall Malefic.
Class_Trait_Desc_Minor Arcana Mastery: Lord of Crowns can be drawn when executing Astral Draw, and Lady of Crowns can be drawn when executing Umbral Draw.
